smart_goals.description: By next visit, I will walk 30 minutes a day, 5 days a week to help lose weight and reduce stress.
I will monitor my blood pressure at home twice a week and share the results with my healthcare provider to make sure it stays under control.
By next visit, I will keep my daily calorie intake to 1500 calories or less to help manage my weight and diabetes.
I will test my blood sugar 4 times a day and share the results with my healthcare provider to make sure it stays within a healthy range.
